Metadata.Title: Administration Interfaces to the Router Are Enumerated And Secured
Metadata.DirectLink: Administration Interfaces to the Router Are Enumerated And Secured

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that only required interfaces are enabled on the router. An unused interface is not monitored or controlled, and it is probably not updated. This might expose you to unknown attacks on those interfaces.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
